summary.span: 提供导航和用户界面 (UI)，以跨多个步骤收集相关数据。

span.span: Provides navigation and a user interface (UI) to collect related data across multiple steps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [向导组件Wizard Components](#components) - [向导步骤Wizard Steps](#wizard_steps) - [收集向导数据Collecting Wizard Data](#collecting_wizard_data) - [向导命令名称Wizard Command Names](#wizard_command_names) - [动态更改步骤Dynamically Changing Steps](#dynamically_changing_steps) - [向导外观Wizard Appearance](#wizard_appearance) - [使用布局模板设置格式Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 您可以使用控件来执行以下操作:You can use the control to: - 跨多个步骤收集相关数据。Collect related data across multiple steps. - 分解一个更大的网页, 用于将用户输入收集到较小的逻辑步骤。Break up a larger Web page used to collect user input into smaller logical steps. - 允许线性或非线性导航完成这些步骤。Allow for either linear or nonlinear navigation through the steps. ## 向导组件Wizard Components 该控件由以下组件组成:The control is made up of the following components: - 一系列步骤, 其中包含由页面开发人员定义的每个步骤的用户界面。A collection of steps that contain the user interface for each step, as defined by the page developer. - 内置导航功能, 用于根据值确定要显示的相应按钮。Built-in navigation capabilities that determine the appropriate buttons to display based on the value. - 一种标题区域, 可对其进行自定义以显示特定于用户当前所处步骤的信息。A header area that can be customized to display information specific to the step that the user is currently on. - 边栏区域, 可用于快速导航到控件中的步骤。A sidebar area that can be used to quickly navigate to steps in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, 请注意 , 将保留在源视图中。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮来更改属性, 然后运行页面, 则可能不会显示`Wizard`控件的第一步, 因为可能会指向不同的步骤。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. ## 向导步骤Wizard Steps 控件中的每个步骤都有一个属性, 该属性确定该步骤具有的导航功能的类型。Each of the steps in the control has a property that determines the kind of navigation functionality that the step has. 如果没有为属性指定值, 则默认值为。If you do not specify a value for the property, the default value is . 下表列出了属性的可用设置和步骤的结果行为。The following table lists the available settings for the property and the resulting behavior of the step. `WizardStepType.Auto` 为步骤呈现的导航 UI 由声明该步骤的顺序确定。The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared. `WizardStepType.Complete` 该步骤是要显示的最后一个步骤。The step is the last one to appear. 不呈现任何导航按钮。No navigation buttons are rendered. `WizardStepType.Finish` 步骤是收集用户数据的最后一个步骤。The step is the last one that collects user data. 为导航呈现 "**完成**" 按钮。The **Finish** button is rendered for navigation. `WizardStepType.Start` 该步骤是要显示的第一个步骤。The step is the first one to appear. 不呈现 "**上一步**" 按钮。A **Previous** button is not rendered. `WizardStepType.Step` 步骤是第一个和最后一个步骤之间的任何步骤。The step is any step between the first and last. 呈现用于导航的“上一步”和“下一步”按钮。**Previous** and **Next** buttons are rendered for navigation. ## 收集向导数据Collecting Wizard Data 使用控件, 可以通过线性或非线性导航来收集数据。Using the control, data can be collected through linear or nonlinear navigation. 非线性导航的一些示例是跳过不必要的步骤, 或返回到之前完成的步骤来更改某个值。Some examples of nonlinear navigation are skipping unnecessary steps or returning to a previously completed step to change some value. 控件在各个步骤之间维护其状态, 因此在步骤中输入的数据无需保存到数据存储区, 直到完成控件的所有步骤。 The control maintains its state between steps, so the data entered on a step does not need to be persisted to a data store until all the steps of the control have been completed. 或者, 如果要在每个步骤完成时将收集的数据保存到数据存储区 ( 如引发事件时), 则应将对象的属性设置为`false` , 以便用户无法返回到之前完成的步骤, 并在数据提交后更改数据。Alternatively, if you want to persist the collected data to a data store as each step is completed, such as when the event is raised, you should set the property of the object to `false` so that the user cannot return to a previously completed step and change the data once it has been submitted. ## 向导命令名称Wizard Command Names 控件继承类和类中的以下命令名称:、、和。 The control inherits the following command names from the class and class: , , , and . 向导控件忽略这些命令名称, 并且不包含任何特殊逻辑来使这些命令自动用于导航。The Wizard control ignores these command names and does not include any special logic to enable these commands to automatically work for navigation. 如果从控件中的按钮删除或缺少命令名称, 则不会引发异常。If a command name is removed or is missing from a button in the control, no exception is thrown. 例如, 如果按钮缺少的值, 则不会引发异常。For example, if the button is missing a value for , no exception is thrown. ## 动态更改步骤Dynamically Changing Steps 您可以使用方法或属性动态更改当前显示在控件中的步骤。You can use the method or the property to dynamically change the step that is currently displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果以编程方式 `Page_Load`在事件处理程序中添加, 则必须在加载页面之前将导航添加到该步骤。If you programmatically add a in the `Page_Load` event handler, you must add the navigation to that step prior to the page loading. ## 向导外观Wizard Appearance 控件的外观可通过模板、外观和样式设置完全自定义。The appearance of the control is fully customizable through templates, skins, and style settings. 例如, 您可以使用、 、 、 和属性来自定义控件的接口。For example, you can use the , , , , and properties to customize the interface of the control. > [!NOTE] > 设置、 、、 、或属性将重新创建控件的子控件。 Setting the , , , , , or property recreates the child controls of the control. 因此, 子控件的视图状态会在进程中丢失。As a result, the view state for the child controls is lost in the process. 若要避免这种情况, 请显式保持控件的子控件的控件状态, 或避免在模板内放置控件。To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the control's child controls explicitly, or avoid putting controls inside of templates. 请注意, 对于非标准或兼容模式, 控件不支持特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈现。Note that the control does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode. 若要使用控件获得最佳的 Internet Explorer 呈现功能, 请使用 XHTML 文档类型, 该类型默认情况下会在 visual Web Developer 和 visual Studio 中添加。To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio. ## 使用布局模板设置格式Formatting Using Layout Templates 控件使你可以指定控件的布局, 而无需使用 HTML `table`元素。 The control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element. 相反, 可以使用`LayoutTemplate`元素来指定布局。Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout. 在模板中, 创建占位符控件以指示应将项动态插入控件的位置。In the template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control. (这与控件的模板模型的工作方式类似。)有关更多信息，请参见 属性。(This is similar to how the template model for the control works.) For more information, see the property. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义一个控件以收集用户的名称和地址, 并提供用于输入单独的装运地址的选项。The following code example demonstrates how to define a control to collect a user's name and address, with the option to enter a separate shipping address. 如果用户未选择**SeparateShippingCheckBox**, 因而发出了添加单独的寄送地址的请求, 则控件会直接从`Step2`移动到`Finish`。If the user does not select **SeparateShippingCheckBox**, thereby issuing a request to add a separate shipping address, the control moves directly from `Step2` to `Finish`. 在该`Finish`步骤中, 用户可以选择返回到控件开头, 方法`Step1`是单击 " **GoBackButton**"; 但是, 它会使用户进入`Step2` , 因为的属性被设置为`false`.On the `Finish` step, the user has the option to return to the beginning of the control by clicking **GoBackButton**; however, it takes the user to `Step2` because the property for `Step1` is set to `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供当前在控件中显示的对象的从零开始的索引。 The property provides the zero-based index of the object that is currently displayed in the control. 您可以通过编程方式设置属性来控制运行时向用户显示的步骤。You can programmatically set the property to control which step is displayed to the user at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, 请注意 , 将保留在源视图中。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮来更改属性, 然后运行页面, 则可能不会显示`Wizard`控件的第一步, 因为可能会指向不同的步骤。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果将的值设置为-1 以支持默认情况下不包含步骤的向导, 则会发生以下行为:If you set the value of to -1 to support a wizard with no steps by default, the following behavior occurs: - 如果以声明方式设置为-1, 或将其设置为-1 作为默认值, 则控件将始终尝试呈现向导中的第一步。If you declaratively set to -1 or set it to -1 as a default value, the control will always try to render the first step in the wizard. - 如果以编程方式将设置为-1, 则不会呈现控件。If you programmatically set to -1, the control will not render. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来设置控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the property of the control. 如果`CheckBox1.Checked`的`Wizard1.Step2`值`true`为, 则`Wizard1.Step3`将属性设置为; 否则, 属性设置为。If the value of `CheckBox1.Checked` is `true`, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step3`; otherwise, the property is set to `Wizard1.Step2`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/CS/wizardactivestepindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStepIndex/VB/wizardactivestepindexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能从派生类访问`protected` 方法,因为它的修饰符。The method can be accessed from a derived class only because of its `protected` modifier. 在派生类中, 您可以使用方法来确定传入的索引是否可用于设置属性。In a derived class, you can use the method to determine whether the index that is passed in can be used to set the property. 如果 `false` `false`传入的`true`索引引用已访问的对象并将其属性设置为,则方法将返回;否则将返回。The method will return `false` if the index that is passed in refers to a object that has already been accessed and has its property set to `false`; otherwise, it will return `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为`CustomWizard`的派生类, 并重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a derived class named `CustomWizard` and override the method. 单击`CustomWizard`控件侧栏区域中的按钮时 , 将调用方法来确定是否可以访问选定的步骤。When a button on the sidebar area of the `CustomWizard` control is clicked, the method is called to determine whether the selected step can be accessed. 然后, 会向包含的网页写入一条消息, 告知用户发生了什么情况。A message is then written to the containing Web page informing the user of what has occurred. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件上的 "**取消**" 按钮时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the **Cancel** button on the control is clicked. 当单击 "**取消**" 按钮时, 可以使用事件来提供其他处理。Use the event to provide additional processing when the **Cancel** button is clicked. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the event. 单击 "**取消**" 按钮后, 该页将重定向到http://www.wingtiptoys.com/。When the **Cancel** button is clicked, the page is redirected to http://www.wingtiptoys.com/. summary.span: 获取或设置单元格内容和单元格边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of the cell and the cell border.

value.span: 单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell border.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的四个边。The padding amount that is specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 列中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元宽度;因此, 间距适用于列中最宽的单元格。All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column. 同样, 同一行中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height. 这样, 间距就会应用于行中最高的单元格。Thus, the spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row. 无法指定单个单元大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性以声明方式对控件的布局进行编程。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to program the layout of the control declaratively. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件上的 "**完成**" 按钮时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the **Finish** button on the control is clicked. 当单击 "**完成**" 按钮时, 可以使用事件来提供其他处理。Use the event to provide additional processing when the **Finish** button is clicked. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify an event handler for the event. 单击 "**完成**" 按钮后, 将向`Label1`写入一条确认消息, 并`Label1.Visible`将属性设置`true`为, 以使消息显示在步骤中。When the **Finish** button is clicked, a confirmation message is written to `Label1` and the `Label1.Visible` property is set to `true` so that the message is displayed on the step. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishButtonClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishButtonClick/CS/wizardfinishbuttonclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishButtonClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishButtonClick/VB/wizardfinishbuttonclickvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含为控件上的 "完成" 按钮显示的文本。 The property contains the text that is displayed for the **Finish** button on the control. 根据属性的值 , 属性可以作为按钮上的文本出现, 作为在不呈现图像的浏览器中显示为图像的替代文本, 或显示为链接的文本。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link. 下表列出了属性的字段值, 并列出了 "**完成**" 按钮文本上每个字段的作用。The following table lists the field values for the property and the respective effect of each on the **Finish** button text. 文本出现在按钮上。Text appears on the button. 文本显示为图像的替代文本。Text appears as alternative text for the image. 文本显示为链接文本。Text appears as link text. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 获取或设置在 步骤中用于显示导航区域的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the navigation area on the step.

value.span: ，定义 上 的导航区域的内容。

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定为控件的步骤显示的导航区域的自定义内容。 Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 通过创建指定如何在步骤中呈现导航区域的模板来定义内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 模板的自定义内容包含在对象内。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 您可以通过在 "设计" 视图中使用模板编辑模式或通过使用`FinishNavigationTemplate`标记来定义嵌入对象, 将自定义内容添加到对象。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `FinishNavigationTemplate` tags. 内容可以像纯文本或更复杂 (例如, 在模板中嵌入其他控件) 一样简单。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > 属性中包含的对象必须包含两个控件,一个控件的属性设置为"MoveComplete",另一个控件的属性设置为"MovePrevious",以启用 导航功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain two controls, one with its property set to "MoveComplete" and the other with its property set to "MovePrevious", to enable the navigation feature. 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件, 请使用对象的集合。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 如果控件具有指定的 属性,则还可以使用对象的方法来查找控件。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为控件的步骤导航区域创建自定义模板。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the navigation area of the step for the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishNavigationTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishNavigationTemplate/CS/wizardfinishnavigationtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishNavigationTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardFinishNavigationTemplate/VB/wizardfinishnavigationtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件步骤中 "**上一**步" 按钮的外观。 The property defines the appearance for the **Previous** button on the step of the control. 属性是只读的; 但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性 (例如`CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`例如)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与属性的样式设置合并在一起。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the property. 在属性中应用的任何设置都将重写属性中的相应设置。Any setting that is applied in the property overrides the corresponding setting in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用属性定义控件的自定义用户界面 (UI)。You can use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the control. 若要指定布局模板, 请在`LayoutTemplate` 控件标记中添加一个元素。To specify a layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the control markup. 在元素内, 为控件的组件添加占位符。 `LayoutTemplate`Inside the `LayoutTemplate` element, add placeholders for the components of the control. 在 元素`LayoutTemplate`中, 控件的导航、边栏和向导步骤部分的占位符是必需的。Placeholders for the navigation, sidebar, and wizard-step sections of the control are required in the `LayoutTemplate` element. > [!NOTE] > 您可以在 "**源**" 视图中修改布局模板。You can modify the layout template in **Source** view. 不支持在 "**设计**" 视图中编辑布局模板。Editing the layout template in **Design** view is not supported. ## Examples 下面的示例`LayoutTemplate`演示如何将元素添加`Wizard`到控件, 以及如何使用`div`元素`Wizard`设置控件组件的格式。The following example shows how to add a `LayoutTemplate` element to the `Wizard` control and how to format the components of the `Wizard` control by using `div` elements. 当控件呈现时, `div`将使用元素而不是 HTML 表设置控件的格式。When the control renders, the `div` elements will be used instead of HTML tables to format the control.

summary.span: 获取一个对 对象的引用，该对象定义控件上导航区域中按钮的设置。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that defines the settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the control.

value.span: 一个对 的引用，该对象定义 上导航区域中按钮的样式设置。

span.span: A reference to the that defines the style settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件上导航区域中按钮的外观。 The property defines the appearance for the buttons in the navigation area on the control. 属性是只读的; 但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性 (例如`CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`例如)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与各个按钮样式合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the individual button styles. 在单个按钮样式属性中应用的任何设置都将覆盖属性中的相应设置。Any setting that is applied in the individual button style properties overrides the corresponding setting in the property. 例如, `FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor`如果将属性设置为`"red"` , 并`NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor`将属性设置为`"green"`, 则按钮的颜色将为红色, 因为属性的各个样式设置会重写属性。For example, if you set the `FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"red"` and the `NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"green"`, the color for the button will be red because the individual style settings of the property override the settings of the property. 以下属性样式由各按钮样式设置重写:The following property styles are overridden by individual button style settings: - - - - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件侧栏上按钮的外观。 The property defines the appearance of the buttons on the sidebar of the control. 属性是只读的; 但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性 (例如`CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`例如)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中应用的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings that are applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the control. 以下样式属性被设置重写:The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 但是, 当使用模板定义控件边栏的外观时 , 属性不起作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control sidebar, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件步骤中的 "**下一步**" 按钮的外观。 The property defines the appearance for the **Next** button on the step of the control. 属性是只读的; 但是, 您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性, 其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性 (例如`CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性 ( `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`例如)。You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与属性的样式设置合并在一起。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the property. 在属性中应用的任何设置都将重写属性中的相应设置。Any setting that is applied in the property overrides the corresponding setting in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含为控件步骤中的 "**下一步**" 按钮显示的文本。 The property contains the text that is displayed for the **Next** button on the step of the control. 根据属性的值 , 属性可以作为按钮上的文本出现, 作为在不呈现图像的浏览器中显示为图像的替代文本, 或显示为链接的文本。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link. 下表列出了属性的字段值, 并列出了每个字段在**下一个**按钮文本上的作用。The following table lists the field values for the property and the respective effect of each on the **Next** button text. 文本出现在按钮上。Text appears on the button. 文本显示为图像的替代文本。Text appears as alternative text for the image. 文本显示为链接。Text appears as a link. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定为控件的步骤显示的导航区域的自定义内容。 Use the property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the step of the control. 通过创建指定如何在步骤中呈现导航区域的模板来定义内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the step. 模板的自定义内容包含在对象内。The custom content for the template is contained within the object. 您可以通过在 "设计" 视图中使用模板编辑模式或通过使用`StepNavigationTemplate`标记来定义嵌入对象, 将自定义内容添加到对象。You can add custom content to the object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the object inline using `StepNavigationTemplate` tags. 内容可以像纯文本或更复杂 (例如, 在模板中嵌入其他控件) 一样简单。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). > [!NOTE] > `"MoveNext"` `"MovePrevious"`属性中包含的对象必须包含两个控件,一个控件的属性设置为,另一个控件的属性设置为,以启用 导航功能。The object that is contained in the property must contain two controls, one with its property set to `"MoveNext"` and one with its property set to `"MovePrevious"`, to enable the navigation feature. 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件, 请使用对象的集合。To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the collection of the object. 如果控件具有指定的 属性,则还可以使用对象的方法来查找控件。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回构成控件的对象的集合。 The property returns a collection of objects that make up the control. 您可以使用该集合以编程方式访问控件中包含的对象。You can use the collection to access the objects that are contained in the control programmatically. 使用、 、和方法以编程方式操作集合中的对象。 Use the , , , and methods to manipulate the objects in the collection programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, 请注意 , 将保留在源视图中。If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the is persisted in Source view. 如果在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮来更改属性, 然后运行页面, 则可能不会显示`Wizard`控件的第一步, 因为可能会指向不同的步骤。If you change the property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the might be pointing to a different step. 如果控件包含多个集合, 则将合并集合。 If the control contains multiple collections, the collections will be merged. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建控件, 以及如何使用方法将对象添加到集合中。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control programmatically and how to use the method to add objects to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps/CS/wizardstepscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardSteps/VB/wizardstepsvb.aspx#1)]
